ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
ygData.msgSnippet: My apologies as well, I ve been a bit touchy lately... for some reason I have RL friends who think being in a farily powerful guild means I have lots and lots
ygData.messageBody:
My apologies as well, I've been a bit touchy lately... for some reason I
have RL friends who think being in a farily powerful guild means I have lots
and lots of free stuffs for them.. like I have 6 CoF gathering dust in my
bank account rather than realizing it means i just die over and over and
over for warrior loot :)

*hugs*
Halana/Tani :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Finger [mailto:mike_finger@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 3:45 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
>
>
> Or are you too new to remember the
> > chains debacle?
>
> New to a bard, but not to EQ. Started 2 months after it went live.
>
> "Cranfill, Wendy" wrote:
> > Yes I believe I said I DID read the whole post. I know
> they will plan to
> > downlevel the mobs. I just hope they actually do it. It
> has nothing to
> do
> > with loot but everything to do with conquoring challenges.
> I just like
> the
> > challenges to be fair.
>
> I apologize, then. I am sick of seeing posts (mainly on eqcasters) of
> people only seeing the things that upset them and not the
> other side. To me
> your post seemed like you did not see the point of tuning
> them down. Again,
> I apologize, I must have missed that in your post.
>
> As far as Verant history. What other choice do you have but
> to trust that
> they will do what they say? Not much other than quit. I
> understand not
> liking the update, but some poeple get *SO* mad, it scares
> me. This is a
> game, nothing more.
>
> I for one, would rather play a slightly "nerfed" EQ, then no
> EQ at all.
>
> I still think the BP is overpowered the way it is.
>
> You need to think of what is realistic for the genre not of
> what would be
> neat. I wish my druid had a 1200 point DD, just like wizards
> wish they
> could cast SOW. Melee wish they could bind/gate. But those
> don't make
> sense. Neither does such a breastplate. At least not to me.
>
> I am sorry, if offended anyone. It was not my intent, just
> expressing my
> views.
>
> Notebender
> 9th Bard of Veeshan
>
